CustomField.description: Takes cash savings at any frequency and returns monthly figure
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Cash_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), 52*Cash__c/12, IF( ISPICKVAL(Cash_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Cash__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Cash_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Cash__c/12,0)))
CustomField.label: Cash savings (monthly)
